item.description:
Wednesdays, July 11, 18, 25 and August 1

The Friends of Long Hill Estate will once again host their 'Music at the Mansion' series in July and August at the Wadsworth Mansion in Middletown. Opening the 2012 Series on July 11th will be The Bernadettes. On July 18th the Highland Rovers Band will perform. Eight to the Bar will return on the 25th and closing out the season on August 1st will be The Michael Cleary Band.

All of the concerts will begin at 6:30 p.m. The grounds will be open for picnicking at 5:30 p.m. Parking will be at the Mansion, at the Wilbert Snow School, 299 Wadsworth Street, and at Mercy High School, 1740 Randolph Road.

Concerts will be held in light rain, or the threat of showers. Concerts will be cancelled in electrical storms or threat to the wellbeing of the musicians or their instruments. Information will be available on the Wadsworth Mansion website at www.wadsworthmansion.com. All concerts are free to the public.

The music series is co-sponsored by the Friends of Long Hill Estate and the Long Hill Estate Authority.
item.name: Music at the Mansion - Eight to the Bar!!!
